sentence.utterance: Acaarɔ paa yaa Deng, ba pac me dwøng o ba pac me døøj.
sentence.morphemes: ácàaarɔ̀  pǎaa jấā dɛ̌ɛɛŋ bǎa pâac mɛ́-dwɔ̂́ɔŋ ʊ̀ bǎa pâac mɛ́-dɔ́ɔɔc̀
sentence.gloss: Acaar village:POSD.PL people:CS Deng:ASSOC NPRED village ATTR:SG-big CONJ NPRED village:SG ATTR:SG-good:CTG
sentence.translation: Acaar, the village of Deng, is a big village and a good village.

sentence.utterance: O men-a Deng kiree, ba jal yab ki gï käyø
sentence.morphemes: ʊ̀ mɛ́n-āa dɛ̄ɛŋ kɪ́-rɛ̄ɛ bǎa ɟàal jáp kɪ́ gìi kʌ̀ʌʌjɔ
sentence.gloss: CONJ DEMPRON-RELCOP Deng PREP-REFL:3SG NPRED man search:AGENTNOM PREP INDPRON:CS proteinrichfood
sentence.translation: And Deng himself, is a man who knows how to look for fish/meat.

sentence.utterance: Ki paanani  teedø buudh-a ri gen ki cam.
sentence.morphemes: kɪ̀ pāaan-ánɪ́ tɛ̀ɛɛt-ɔ bût̪-áa rɪ́-gɛ́n kɪ́ cám
sentence.gloss: PREP village:DEM-DEM group-S cheat:ITERAT-AGENTTOPIC REFL-PRON3PL PREP eat:AGENTNOM
sentence.translation: In that village, people are cheating each other in relation to eating

sentence.utterance: Men-a Deng gincaam gøle pa nyi bele.
sentence.morphemes: mɛ́n-āa dɛ̄ɛŋ gìncấaam gɔ̄l-ɛ̄ pā ɲí bɛ̂l-ɛ̀
sentence.gloss: DEMPRON:CS-RELCOP Deng food:CS compound:CS-POSS3SG NEGPRES HABIT taste:PRES-3SG
sentence.translation: As for Deng, the food of his own house he never tastes.

sentence.utterance: Ma nyi tööng-a bøli tyëng-a kwöngi wänhi dïpac.
sentence.morphemes: máa ɲɪ́ tóooŋ̀-à bɔ̀ɔlɪ́ tjếeeŋ̄ à kwôoŋɪ́ wʌ̀n̪-ɪ̀ dï̄-pâac
sentence.gloss: because HABIT divert:SPATIAL-DESTINATIONFOCUS frontside:PL:CS people:CS MDF dosomethingfirst:AMB arrive:SPATIAL-DVN center:CS-village:SG
sentence.translation: Because it is diverted towards put in front of the people who are first to reach the center of the village.

sentence.utterance: Ka Deng  cyëge nyi gönye.
sentence.morphemes: kấā Dɛ̄ɛŋ cjếeek-ɛ̄ ɲɪ́ gòɲ-ɛ́
sentence.gloss: SEQ Deng wife-POSS3SG HABIT complainabout:BENEF-3SG
sentence.translation: And then [ie, each time that happened] Deng used to complain to his wife.

sentence.utterance: Cyäng akyel ji akedhi be may.
sentence.morphemes: cjʌ̂ŋ ákjɛ̀ɛl ɟɪ̀ɪ á-kɛ̂́t̪-ɪ̀ bēe màaj
sentence.gloss: day one people PAST-go-SPATIAL TO fish:AGENTNOM
sentence.translation: One day, people went fishing.

sentence.utterance: Ka Deng ókëdø ki møøg me dwøng.
sentence.morphemes: kāa dɛ̄ɛŋ ʊ́-kèetɔ kɪ́ mɔ̀ɔk mɛ́-dwɔ̂́ŋ
sentence.gloss: SEQ Deng PRES-spear:ANTIPASS PREP eel:SG ATTR-big:PERM
sentence.translation: And then Deng spears a big eel.

sentence.utterance: Ka gø kääle kal.
sentence.morphemes: kāa gɔ̀ kʌ̌ʌʌl-ɛ́ kàl
sentence.gloss: SEQ PRONOBJ carry:PETAL-3SG compound:SG
sentence.translation: And then he brought it home.

sentence.utterance: Ka møøg thal yi nyagøle.
sentence.morphemes: kāa mɔ̀ɔk t̪ấal ɪ̀ ɲā-gɔ̂́l-ɛ̄
sentence.gloss: SEQ eel cook ERG wife:POSS3SG
sentence.translation: And then his wife cooks the eel.

sentence.utterance: De nganani  rum thal ki kwän.
sentence.morphemes: dɛ́ ŋàaan-ánɪ́ rû́m t̪āal kɪ́ kwʌ̄n
sentence.gloss: BUT person:CS-DEM finish:NEVIDPAST cook:AGENTNOM PREP porridge:SG
sentence.translation: But that person [his wife] had already cooked porridge.

sentence.utterance: Ka otädø ki akelø me caam møøg.
sentence.morphemes: kāa ʊ̀-t̪ʌ̀ʌʌt-ɔ̀ kɪ́ àkɛ̌ɛlɔ́ mɛ́-cāaam mɔ̀ɔk
sentence.gloss: SEQ PRES-cook:ANTIPASS PREP akelo MODIF-eat:APPL k.o.fish
sentence.translation: And then [= after he arrived with the fish] she cooked akelo to be eaten with the eel.

sentence.utterance: Aöre nyawäde  dïpac be cwøli wïye.
sentence.morphemes: à-ǒr-ɛ́ ɲàa wʌ̂́ʌʌt-ɛ̄ dï̄-pâac bɛ̄ɛ cwɔ̂́ɔl-ɪ̀ wíij-ɛ̄
sentence.gloss: send:SEQPAST DIMIN son-3SG center:CS-village:SG PREP call-SG father:CS-3SG
sentence.translation: And then she sent her little son to the centre of the village to call his father.

sentence.utterance: Keny-a awanhi Deng kal,
sentence.morphemes: kɛ̂ɲ āa-wʌ̀n̪ɪ̀ dɛ̄ɛŋ kàl
sentence.gloss: ADV PASTPAF-reach:PETAL Deng compound:SG
sentence.translation: When Deng reached the compound

sentence.utterance: Ka köbbi yi cyëge kinni,
sentence.morphemes: kāa kóop-ɪ̀ ɪ̀ cjếeek-ɛ̄ kɪ̂n-ɪ̀
sentence.gloss: SEQ say-BENEF ERG wife-POSS3SG QUOTE
sentence.translation: then she said [to him] like this:

sentence.utterance: Cam akelø kï kal
sentence.morphemes: càm àkɛ̌ɛlɔ́ kɪ̀ kàl
sentence.gloss: eat:IMPERAT akelo LOC compound:SG
sentence.translation: Eat akelo in the compound,

sentence.utterance: ka wiy kwän kïdhi dïpac
sentence.morphemes: kāa wɪ̂́ɪj kwʌ̄n kît̪-ɪ̀ dï̄-pâac
sentence.gloss: SEQ AUX (let) porridge carry:FUGAL-DEST center:CS-village:SG
sentence.translation: and let porridge be taken to the centre,

sentence.utterance: má cam cam ka wëënyø kĩ paan.
sentence.morphemes: máa cám cấm kấa wéeeɲ̀ɔ kɪ̀ pàaan
sentence.gloss: because eat:AGENTNOM eat:PRESENT PREP:FOCUS deceit LOC village:SG:DEM1
sentence.translation: because eating is eaten by deceit in this village.

sentence.utterance: Codhe
sentence.morphemes: cʊ̄ʊt̪-ɛ̄
sentence.gloss: end:3SG
sentence.translation: After that

sentence.utterance: ka møøg cam yi Deng kï kal
sentence.morphemes: kā mɔ̀ɔk cấm ɪ̀ɪ dɛ̄ɛŋ kɪ̀ kàl
sentence.gloss: SEQ eel:SG eat ERG Deng LOC compound:SG
sentence.translation: Deng ate the eel in the compound

sentence.utterance: ka kwän kïdhi dïpac.
sentence.morphemes: kāa kwʌ̄n kît̪-ɪ̀ dï̄-pâac
sentence.gloss: SEQ porridge:SG carry:FUGAL-DEST center:CS-village:SG
sentence.translation: And then the porridge was carried to the center of the village.

sentence.utterance: Teen-a ánëën  ápïd yi nënni møøg pa kääl
sentence.morphemes: tɛ̀ɛn-ɪ̀ āa-nèeen á-pî́t ERG nếenɪ̄ mɔ̀ɔk pāa kʌ́ʌʌl̀
sentence.gloss: people:DEM1 PASTPAF-watch PAST-becometired:CAUS ɪ̀ watch:INF eel:SG NEGPRES carry:PETAL
sentence.translation: Those who were watching [for the eel to be brought], the watching made them tired: the fish is not brought.

sentence.utterance: de yöd-á kwän a kääl.
sentence.morphemes: dɛ́ jōot-áa kwʌ̄n āa-kʌ́ʌʌl̀
sentence.gloss: BUT turn:REL porridge:SG PASTPAF-carry:PETAL
sentence.translation: but instead the porridge is brought.

sentence.utterance: Bongan-á ágööny thyew
sentence.morphemes: bʊ̄-ŋâaan āa-gòooɲ t̪jɛ̀ɛw
sentence.gloss: no-person:CS no-person:CS ADV
sentence.translation: Nonetheless, nobody complained

sentence.utterance: má gïncaam Deng áwädhi dïpac  kidyër

sentence.gloss: because food:SG:CS Deng PAST-reach-DEST center:CS-village:SG PREP truth
sentence.translation: because Deng's food has truly reached the centre

sentence.utterance: De path
sentence.morphemes: dɛ́ pất̪
sentence.gloss: BUT NEGPRES
sentence.translation: but it was not

sentence.utterance: ki men-a árømi yi gen.
sentence.morphemes: kɪ́ mɛ́n āa-rɔ́m-ɪ̀ gɛ́n
sentence.gloss: PREP DEMPRON:CS PAST&PAF-thinkabout PRON3PL
sentence.translation: the one, which they thought of.

sentence.utterance: Deng, møøg ácaame gøle,
sentence.morphemes: dɛ̄ɛŋ mɔ̀ɔk á-cǎaam-ɛ́ gɔ̂́l-ɛ̄
sentence.gloss: Deng eel:SG PAST-eat:FUGAL-3SG compound:CS-3SG
sentence.translation: Deng, he went to eat the eel in his house

sentence.utterance: ka bëëdi wëënyø wiy yi paanani
sentence.morphemes: kāa bèet-ɪ̀ wéeeɲ̀ɔ wɪ̂́ɪj ɪ̀ pāaan-ánɪ́
sentence.gloss: SEQ stay:NOM-CS deceit AUX (let) ERG village:DEM1-DEM
sentence.translation: and then the village abandoned its deceitful way of living.

sentence.utterance: Ka pac døøg-a keje.

sentence.gloss: SEQ village:SG return:FUGAL:DEST place:CS-3SG
